# === Catch2 === 
option(CATCH_BUILD_EXAMPLES OFF)
option(CATCH_BUILD_EXTRA_TESTS OFF)
option(CATCH_BUILD_STATIC_LIBRARY OFF)
option(CATCH_BUILD_TESTING OFF)
option(CATCH_ENABLE_COVERAGE OFF)
option(CATCH_ENABLE_WERROR OFF)
option(CATCH_INSTALL_DOCS OFF)
option(CATCH_INSTALL_HELPERS OFF)
option(CATCH_USE_VALGRIND OFF)

add_subdirectory(Catch2)
